Node.Text: So you think you can be a clown, a joker, a goof meister?!

Node.OptionToEnter: Yeah, everyone's always laughing at me!
Node.Text: You don't need to shout it, I can see that just looking at you!

Node.OptionToEnter: Do I look like a funny guy to you?
I'm a bit of a jester myself
Node.Text: I'd say you're more like a fool than a Jester.
